channel.title: CVE Feed for mindsdb -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mindsdb -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-45854|2024-09-12T13:03:30.197Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions 23.10.3.0 and newer of the MindsDB platform, enabling a maliciously uploaded ‘inhouse’ model to run arbitrary code on the server when a ‘describe’ query is run on it.

item.title: CVE-2024-45850|2024-09-12T13:00:18.531Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability exists in versions 23.10.5.0 up to 24.7.4.1 of the MindsDB platform, when the Microsoft SharePoint integration is installed on the server. For databases created with the SharePoint engine, an ‘INSERT’ query can be used for site column creation. If such a query is specially crafted to contain Python code and is run against the database, the code will be passed to an eval function and executed on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-45856|2024-09-12T13:05:01.526Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in all versions of the MindsDB platform, enabling the execution of a JavaScript payload whenever a user enumerates an ML Engine, database, project, or dataset containing arbitrary JavaScript code within the web UI.

item.title: CVE-2024-45851|2024-09-12T13:01:02.816Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability exists in versions 23.10.5.0 up to 24.7.4.1 of the MindsDB platform, when the Microsoft SharePoint integration is installed on the server. For databases created with the SharePoint engine, an ‘INSERT’ query can be used for list item creation. If such a query is specially crafted to contain Python code and is run against the database, the code will be passed to an eval function and executed on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-45853|2024-09-12T13:03:02.719Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions 23.10.2.0 and newer of the MindsDB platform, enabling a maliciously uploaded ‘inhouse’ model to run arbitrary code on the server when used for a prediction.

item.title: CVE-2024-45852|2024-09-12T13:02:29.831Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions 23.3.2.0 and newer of the MindsDB platform, enabling a maliciously uploaded model to run arbitrary code on the server when interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2024-45855|2024-09-12T13:04:13.076Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in versions 23.10.2.0 and newer of the MindsDB platform, enabling a maliciously uploaded ‘inhouse’ model to run arbitrary code on the server when using ‘finetune’ on it.

item.title: CVE-2024-24759|2024-09-05T17:46:08.516Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: MindsDB is a platform for building artificial intelligence from enterprise data. Prior to version 23.12.4.2, a threat actor can bypass the server-side request forgery protection on the whole website with DNS Rebinding. The vulnerability can also lead to denial of service. Version 23.12.4.2 contains a patch.

item.title: CVE-2024-24759|2024-09-05T16:30:38.659Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: MindsDB is a platform for building artificial intelligence from enterprise data. Prior to version 23.12.4.2, a threat actor can bypass the server-side request forgery protection on the whole website with DNS Rebinding. The vulnerability can also lead to denial of service. Version 23.12.4.2 contains a patch.

item.title: CVE-2024-45849|2024-09-12T12:59:25.993Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability exists in versions 23.10.5.0 up to 24.7.4.1 of the MindsDB platform, when the Microsoft SharePoint integration is installed on the server. For databases created with the SharePoint engine, an ‘INSERT’ query can be used for list creation. If such a query is specially crafted to contain Python code and is run against the database, the code will be passed to an eval function and executed on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-45847|2024-09-12T12:57:42.357Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability exists in versions 23.11.4.2 up to 24.7.4.1 of the MindsDB platform, when one of several integrations is installed on the server. If a specially crafted ‘UPDATE’ query containing Python code is run against a database created with the specified integration engine, the code will be passed to an eval function and executed on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-45846|2024-09-12T12:56:48.362Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability exists in versions 23.10.3.0 up to 24.7.4.1 of the MindsDB platform, when the Weaviate integration is installed on the server. If a specially crafted ‘SELECT WHERE’ clause containing Python code is run against a database created with the Weaviate engine, the code will be passed to an eval function and executed on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-45848|2024-09-12T12:58:32.914Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability exists in versions 23.12.4.0 up to 24.7.4.1 of the MindsDB platform, when the ChromaDB integration is installed on the server. If a specially crafted ‘INSERT’ query containing Python code is run against a database created with the ChromaDB engine, the code will be passed to an eval function and executed on the server.
